briefTitle: Brivaracetam as add-on Treatment in Adolescents and Adults Suffering From Epilepsy

summary: This study will compare the safety and efficacy of Brivaracetam at flexible dose with Placebo in subjects suffering from Epilepsy.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects With at Least One Adverse Event During the 16-week Treatment Period
